responsibilities: Own large new areas within our product
Work across backend, frontend, and interact with LLMs and/or other ML models
Deliver experiments at a high velocity and level of quality to engage customers
Work across the entire product lifecycle from conceptualization through production

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new product features and experiences

qualifications: Proficiency in one or more of Python, Node, React, Next.js, and MongoDB
Solid background in algorithms, data structures, and object-oriented programming
Experience scaling products at hyper-growth startups
Excitement to work with AI technologies
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work independently or as part of a team
analysis: The job responsibilities include "Work across backend, frontend, and interact with LLMs and/or other ML models," which explicitly mentions interaction with Large Language Models (LLMs). This indicates that the job involves working with language models. Additionally, the skills section lists "Excitement to work with AI technologies," which further supports the involvement with AI, potentially including Generative AI (GenAI) or LLMs. The combination of these responsibilities and skills strongly suggests that the job involves working with Generative AI or language models.
